message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects the urgency for me to settle due to inflation.

Alice, your initial offer wasn't unfair considering the inflation, but it heavily favored you. Let's meet closer to the middle ground this time. I'm proposing a more balanced split that acknowledges the time pressure we both face.
Bob, your offer was tempting, but still not equitable considering the faster devaluation I'm facing.  Let's settle this fairly - my offer recognizes the time pressure on both of us.
